job_description:
• Operational Leader: Experience owning mission-critical services where downtime is not an option, with a strong focus on telemetry and data-driven reliability.
• 8+ years of proven experience designing, developing, debugging, and operating resilient distributed systems that run across thousands of compute nodes in multiple data centers, with a focus on Networking technologiesExpert-level coding in Golang, Python, or C/C++ in a Linux/UNIX environment.
• Distributed Systems: Proven experience building and operating resilient, high-availability services at scale.
• Production Ownership: Experience owning Tier 0/1 services, including designing for Disaster Recovery and multi-region failover.
• Agile Leadership: Experience in Agile/Scrum environments with a commitment to Test-Driven Development and high code quality.
• Excellent written and verbal communication skillsA related Technical degree required Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
• Org Sustainability Investors Give us your Feedback Sitemap Legal Terms of Service Privacy Information Responsible Disclosure Trust Contact Manage Preferences University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager.
• Shape the Future of Cloud NetworkingArchitect Global Infrastructure: Design and operate Tier 0/1 networking services that power Salesforce’s massive public cloud footprint, ensuring they are resilient to regional failures and support seamless Disaster Recovery (DR).
